name: DYSENTROPY
description:
In this world, your voice propels you, but not entirely under your control!
Pick your words carefully, and what you say even more so, lest your tongue lead you to your death.

HOW TO PLAY

Controls are keyboard and mouse.
Your goal is to get the key and go to the door.
To do so, you have to drag and drop words on the stone tablets and use them to move.
Each time you type a letter, this letter disappears on all the words and makes your character move depending on where it was.

For example, the word "RIGHT" is written on the right, if you type "R" the letter will disappear, and you will move once on the right.

CONTROLS

Left Control: Preview level
+/-: Zoom
Caps Lock: Reset Level

Made for the GJL Game Parade Summer Jam 2021! Theme: One Time Use!
